comments.text:
When right clicking on a message, the menu items include:

  Open Message in New Window
  Open Message in New Tab
  Open Message in Conversation

The wording of the last one sounds strange to me, because a conversation isn't the same kind of thing as a window or a tab.  I think a better description is "Open Conversation in New Tab".

Same for "Open in Conversation" in the top-level Message menu.
